Every single Sunday, BL√Ö and the Frank Znort Quartet create an atmosphere of peace, happiness, and freedom, accompanied by the clinking of beer glasses and twisted versions of songs you never realized you loved.

With their joyful approach to various genres and songs, along with an unbeatable Sunday vibe for those not quite ready to let go of the weekend, this 16-member "quartet" has been standing strong for over 27 years, ready to give you an experience you won‚Äôt soon forget, week after week, year after year.

Frank Znort doesn't carry the slogan, "Frank Znort every Sunday, We Fuck Up Your Mondays!" for nothing.
